explanations.reason: The paper focuses on a systematic review of lithium-ion battery (LIB) recycling literature using ProKnow-C and Methodi Ordinatio methodologies. It discusses the environmental and economic benefits of LIB recycling, the process of filtering and analyzing articles, and the creation of a bibliographic portfolio. There is no mention of any machine learning techniques, algorithms, or related concepts in the title or abstract. The study is centered on bibliometric analysis and systematic review methodologies rather than machine learning or any of its subfields.
